display_long_description:
**Lora** is a language learning application that is fun, easy, and immersive, focusing on your goals and the key points you want to learn. 

Master over **10 languages**, including **French** 🇫🇷, **Spanish** 🇪🇸, **English** 🇬🇧, **Japanese** 🇯🇵, **Korean** 🇰🇷, **Chinese** 🇨🇳, **Portuguese** 🇵🇹, **Dutch** 🇳🇱, **Arabic** 🇦🇪, and **German** 🇩🇪.
[media]

Support us to keep Lora VR free for everyone! Your contribution helps us develop new features, expand language options, and make language learning accessible to all. 
You can **support us** by purchasing items in the store, such as **weapon skins, coins, and special packs!**

⚔️ **Slice and Shoot Modes**

Choose your vocabulary and engage in sword or gun mode to interact with objects while hearing or reading their names. Play in arcade mode for fast-paced action or learning mode for focused memorization with visual and auditory cues.

[media]

**Word Explorer** 🌍🔍

In **Word Explorer**, test your vocabulary skills in a fun and interactive way! An object, animal, profession, or other word will appear in front of you, and you must choose the correct answer from **four options**. Select the right one to progress and expand your knowledge across different categories!
[media]

Lessons AI! 🤖🎓

Boost your language skills with **Lessons AI**, an interactive mode designed for real-world practice!

📝 **Grammar Lessons**: Master sentence structure with guided grammar exercises.

🎤 **Immersive Mode**: Choose between free conversation or a **job interview simulation** to practice professional discussions.
[media]
